languages.text:
The Commissar shoots an allied character with the pistol equipped in their primary hand, dealing {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}% of weapon damage. This shot ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
If that ally is a xenos, this always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g} hit.
If the ally remains in combat, they gain the {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}at all costs!{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If that ally falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, this effect is instead applied to all the Commissar's other allies (except the Commissar themselves), and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of this ability is reset at the start of the Commissar's next turn.
languages.original_text:
Комиссар стреляет в союзника из пистолета в ведущей руке и наносит {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}% урона. Этот выстрел игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} и всегда {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}достигает цели{/g}.
Если союзник комиссара — ксенос, попадание всегда будет {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.
Если союзник остается в строю после выстрела, то он получает эффект {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}Задать им жару!{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Если этот союзник {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}теряет сознание{/g}, то эффект применяется ко всем остальным союзникам (исключая самого комиссара), и период {g|Encyclopedia:восстановления}{/g} способности завершается в начале его следующего хода.

traits.locale_text:
The Commissar shoots an allied character with the pistol equipped in their primary hand, dealing {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}% of weapon damage. This shot ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
If that ally is a xenos, this always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g} hit.
If the ally remains in combat, they gain the {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}at all costs!{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If that ally falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, this effect is instead applied to all the Commissar's other allies (except the Commissar themselves), and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of this ability is reset at the start of the Commissar's next turn.

The Commissar shoots an allied character with the pistol equipped in their primary hand, dealing {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}% of weapon damage. This shot ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
If that ally is a xenos, this always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g} hit.
If the ally remains in combat, they gain the {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}at all costs!{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If that ally falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, this effect is instead applied to all the Commissar's other allies (except the Commissar themselves), and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of this ability is reset at the start of the Commissar's next turn.

The Commissar's next {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} or single-target {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} applies the following effects:
-<indent=5%>Enemy Target: the target becomes marked. The ally who kills the marked enemy gains an extra turn after the current one with +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Allied Target: all allies gain an additional +1 AP and +3 MP for 1 round.</indent>{br}
! Can only be used once per combat.
! The Commissar themselves cannot gain bonuses from this ability.

The Commissar shoots an allied character with the pistol equipped in their primary hand, dealing {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}% of weapon damage. This shot ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
If that ally is a xenos, the hit is always {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g}.
If the ally remains in combat, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} they gain the {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}at all costs!{/g} effect.
If the ally falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, this effect is instead applied to all other Commissar's allies (except the Commissar themselves), and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of this ability is reset at the start of the Commissar's next turn.

languages.text:
Der Kommissar feuert mit der Pistole in seiner Primärhand auf einen verbündeten Charakter und verursacht {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e} % Waffenschaden. Dieser Schuss ignoriert {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} immer.
Ist dieser Verbündete ein Xenos, erzielt dieser Angriff immer einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen{/g} Treffer.Bleibt der Verbündete im Kampf, erhält er 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang den Effekt {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}Um jeden Preis!{/g}.
Wird dieser Verbündete {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlos{/g}, werden stattdessen alle anderen Verbündeten des Kommissars (mit Ausnahme des Kommissars selbst) mit diesem Effekt belegt und die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} dieser Fähigkeit wird zu Beginn des nächsten Zuges des Kommissars zurückgesetzt.
languages.original_text:
The Commissar shoots an allied character with the pistol equipped in their primary hand, dealing {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}% of weapon damage. This shot ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
If that ally is a xenos, this always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g} hit.
If the ally remains in combat, they gain the {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}at all costs!{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If that ally falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, this effect is instead applied to all the Commissar's other allies (except the Commissar themselves), and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of this ability is reset at the start of the Commissar's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Der Kommissar feuert mit der Pistole in seiner Primärhand auf einen verbündeten Charakter und verursacht {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e} % Waffenschaden. Dieser Schuss ignoriert {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} immer.
Ist dieser Verbündete ein Xenos, erzielt dieser Angriff immer einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen{/g} Treffer.Bleibt der Verbündete im Kampf, erhält er 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang den Effekt {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}Um jeden Preis!{/g}.
Wird dieser Verbündete {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlos{/g}, werden stattdessen alle anderen Verbündeten des Kommissars (mit Ausnahme des Kommissars selbst) mit diesem Effekt belegt und die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} dieser Fähigkeit wird zu Beginn des nächsten Zuges des Kommissars zurückgesetzt.

Der nächste {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g}- oder {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Einzelziel-Nahkampfangriff{/g} des Kommissars wendet die folgenden Effekte an:
-<indent=5%>Feindliches Ziel: Das Ziel wird markiert. Der Verbündete, der den markierten Feind tötet, erhält einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} nach dem aktuellen mit +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Verbündetes Ziel: Alle Verbündeten erhalten für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} zusätzlich +1 AP und +3 BP.</indent>{br}
! Kann nur einmal pro Kampf verwendet werden.
! Der Kommissar selbst kann keine {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} durch diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} erhalten.

languages.text:
Le commissaire tire sur un personnage allié avec le pistolet de sa main principale et lui inflige {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e} % des dégâts de l'arme. Ce tir ignore l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} toujours sa cible.
Si l'allié est un xénos, il inflige systématiquement un coup {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critique{/g}.
Si l'allié continue le combat, il gagne l'effet {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}Coûte que coûte !{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Si l'allié {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}perd connaissance{/g}, cet effet est appliqué à tous les autres alliés du commissaire (à l'exception du commissaire lui-même), et le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} de cette capacité est réinitialisé au début du tour suivant du commissaire.
languages.original_text:
The Commissar shoots an allied character with the pistol equipped in their primary hand, dealing {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}% of weapon damage. This shot ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
If that ally is a xenos, this always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g} hit.
If the ally remains in combat, they gain the {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}at all costs!{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If that ally falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, this effect is instead applied to all the Commissar's other allies (except the Commissar themselves), and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of this ability is reset at the start of the Commissar's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Le commissaire tire sur un personnage allié avec le pistolet de sa main principale et lui inflige {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e} % des dégâts de l'arme. Ce tir ignore l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} toujours sa cible.
Si l'allié est un xénos, il inflige systématiquement un coup {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critique{/g}.
Si l'allié continue le combat, il gagne l'effet {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}Coûte que coûte !{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Si l'allié {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}perd connaissance{/g}, cet effet est appliqué à tous les autres alliés du commissaire (à l'exception du commissaire lui-même), et le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} de cette capacité est réinitialisé au début du tour suivant du commissaire.

L'attaque de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}au coup par coup{/g} ou à cible unique suivante du commissaire applique les effets suivants :
-<indent=5%>Cible ennemie : la cible est désignée. L'allié qui élimine l'ennemi désigné bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire après le tour en cours, avec +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Cible alliée : tous les alliés bénéficient de +1 PA et +3 PD supplémentaires pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>{br}
! Utilisable une fois par combat.
! Le commissaire lui-même ne peut pas {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bénéficier{/g} de cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}.

languages.text:
政委使用主手装备的手枪射击一名盟友，造成{uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}%武器伤害。此次射击无视目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，且必定{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标。
如果盟友为异形，则此次射击必定造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。
如果该名盟友继续保持战斗，则获得{g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}排除万难！{/g}效果，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
如果该名盟友陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态，则所有其他盟友获得此效果（政委本人除外），且此能力的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}会在政委的下个回合开始时重置。
languages.original_text:
The Commissar shoots an allied character with the pistol equipped in their primary hand, dealing {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}% of weapon damage. This shot ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
If that ally is a xenos, this always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g} hit.
If the ally remains in combat, they gain the {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}at all costs!{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If that ally falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, this effect is instead applied to all the Commissar's other allies (except the Commissar themselves), and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of this ability is reset at the start of the Commissar's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
政委使用主手装备的手枪射击一名盟友，造成{uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}%武器伤害。此次射击无视目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，且必定{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标。
如果盟友为异形，则此次射击必定造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。
如果该名盟友继续保持战斗，则获得{g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}排除万难！{/g}效果，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
如果该名盟友陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态，则所有其他盟友获得此效果（政委本人除外），且此能力的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}会在政委的下个回合开始时重置。

languages.text:
El comisario dispara a un aliado con la pistola de su mano principal, infligiendo un {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e} % del daño de arma. Este disparo ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}, y siempre {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g}.
Si el aliado es xenos, siempre se produce un impacto {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}crítico{/g}.
Si el aliado sigue luchando, obtiene el efecto {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}¡A cualquier precio!{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
Si el aliado queda {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g}, el efecto se aplica a los demás aliados del comisario (exceptuando al propio comisario) y el {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} de la capacidad se reinicia al principio del siguiente turno del comisario.
languages.original_text:
The Commissar shoots an allied character with the pistol equipped in their primary hand, dealing {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}% of weapon damage. This shot ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
If that ally is a xenos, this always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g} hit.
If the ally remains in combat, they gain the {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}at all costs!{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If that ally falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, this effect is instead applied to all the Commissar's other allies (except the Commissar themselves), and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of this ability is reset at the start of the Commissar's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
El comisario dispara a un aliado con la pistola de su mano principal, infligiendo un {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e} % del daño de arma. Este disparo ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}, y siempre {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g}.
Si el aliado es xenos, siempre se produce un impacto {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}crítico{/g}.
Si el aliado sigue luchando, obtiene el efecto {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}¡A cualquier precio!{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
Si el aliado queda {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g}, el efecto se aplica a los demás aliados del comisario (exceptuando al propio comisario) y el {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} de la capacidad se reinicia al principio del siguiente turno del comisario.

El siguiente ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}un solo disparo{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} de un objetivo del comisario aplica los siguientes efectos:
-<indent=5%>Objetivo enemigo: El objetivo queda marcado. El aliado que mate al enemigo marcado gana un turno extra después del actual con +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Objetivo aliado: Todos los aliados ganan +1 PA y +3 PM durante 1 asalto.</indent>{br}
! Solo funciona una vez por combate.
! El comisario no recibe bonificaciones por esta capacidad.

languages.text:
コミッサーは主手に装備したピストルで味方キャラクターを撃ち、武器ダメージの{uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}%を与える。この射撃は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}を無視し、常に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}する。
もしその味方がゼノであれば、常に{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル{/g}となる。
味方が戦闘に残っている場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}どんな犠牲を払っても！{/g}効果を得る。
味方が意識を失った場合、この効果は他のすべての味方（コミッサー自身を除く）に適用される。
! このアビリティは戦闘中に1回しか使用できない。
languages.original_text:
The Commissar shoots an allied character with the pistol equipped in their primary hand, dealing {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}% of weapon damage. This shot ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
If that ally is a xenos, the hit is always {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g}.
If the ally remains in combat, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} they gain the {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}at all costs!{/g} effect.
If the ally falls unconscious, this effect is instead applied to all other allies (except the Commissar themselves).
! This ability can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
コミッサーの次の単発射撃または単体対象近接攻撃は以下の効果を付与する：
-<indent=5%>敵ターゲット：ターゲットはマークされる。マークされた敵を倒した味方は、現在のターンの後に、APが+2、MPが+4された状態で追加ターンを得る。</indent>
-<indent=5%>味方ターゲット：次ラウンドの間、すべての味方はAPが+1、MPが+3される。</indent>{br}
！1戦闘につき1回だけ使用できる。
！コミッサー自身はこのアビリティのボーナスは得られない。

languages.text:
Комиссар стреляет в союзника из пистолета в ведущей руке и наносит {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}% урона. Этот выстрел игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} и всегда {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}достигает цели{/g}.
Если союзник комиссара — ксенос, попадание всегда будет {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.
Если союзник остается в строю после выстрела, то он получает эффект {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}Задать им жару!{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Если этот союзник {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}теряет сознание{/g}, то эффект применяется ко всем остальным союзникам (исключая самого комиссара), и период {g|Encyclopedia:восстановления}{/g} способности завершается в начале его следующего хода.
languages.original_text:
The Commissar shoots an allied character with the pistol equipped in their primary hand, dealing {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}% of weapon damage. This shot ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
If that ally is a xenos, the hit is always {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g}.
If the ally remains in combat, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} they gain the {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}at all costs!{/g} effect.
If the ally falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, this effect is instead applied to all other Commissar's allies (except the Commissar themselves), and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of this ability is reset at the start of the Commissar's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Комиссар стреляет в союзника из пистолета в ведущей руке и наносит {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}% урона. Этот выстрел игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} и всегда {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}достигает цели{/g}.
Если союзник комиссара — ксенос, попадание всегда будет {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.
Если союзник остается в строю после выстрела, то он получает эффект {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}Задать им жару!{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Если этот союзник {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}теряет сознание{/g}, то эффект применяется ко всем остальным союзникам (исключая самого комиссара), и период {g|Encyclopedia:восстановления}{/g} способности завершается в начале его следующего хода.

Следующий одиночный выстрел или атака одиночной цели вблизи получает следующие свойства:
-<indent=5%>Вражеская цель: получает метку. Если союзник убивает цель с меткой, то после завершения своего хода он получает дополнительный ход с 2 ОД и 4 ОП.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Союзная цель: в следующем раунде все союзники получают +1 ОД и +3 ОП дополнительно.</indent>{br}
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.
! Сам комиссар не получает бонусы от этой способности.

Комиссар стреляет в союзника из пистолета в ведущей руке и наносит <u>{uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}%</u> урона. Этот выстрел игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} и никогда {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}не промахивается{/g}.
Если союзник комиссара — ксенос, попадание всегда будет {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.
Если этот союзник остается в бою, то он получает эффект {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}Задать им жару!{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Если этот союзник теряет сознание, то эффект применяется ко всем остальным союзникам комиссара (исключая его самого).
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

Комиссар стреляет в союзника из пистолета в ведущей руке и наносит {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}% урона. Этот выстрел игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} и всегда {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}достигает цели{/g}.
Если союзник комиссара — ксенос, попадание всегда будет {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.
Если союзник остается в строю после выстрела, то он получает эффект {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}Задать им жару!{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Если этот союзник теряет сознание, то эффект применяется ко всем остальным союзникам (исключая самого комиссара).
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

languages.text:
Komiser, ana elindeki tabancayla dost bir karakteri vurursa silah hasarının %{uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e} kadarını verir. Bu atış, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerlerini yok sayar ve her zaman {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurur{/g}.
Bu dost birim bir zenoysa bu vuruş her zaman {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşa{/g} dönüşür.
Dost birim çatışmada kalırsa 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}canın pahasına!{/g} etkisi kazanır.
Aynı dost birim {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}baygın{/g} düşerse bu etki onun yerine Komiser'in diğer tüm dost birimlerine (Komiser'in kendisi hariç) uygulanır ve bu kabiliyetin {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süresi{/g}, Komiser'in bir sonraki turunun başlangıcında sıfırlanır.
languages.original_text:
The Commissar shoots an allied character with the pistol equipped in their primary hand, dealing {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}% of weapon damage. This shot ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
If that ally is a xenos, this always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical{/g} hit.
If the ally remains in combat, they gain the {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}at all costs!{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If that ally falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, this effect is instead applied to all the Commissar's other allies (except the Commissar themselves), and the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of this ability is reset at the start of the Commissar's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Komiser, ana elindeki tabancayla dost bir karakteri vurursa silah hasarının %{uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e} kadarını verir. Bu atış, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerlerini yok sayar ve her zaman {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurur{/g}.
Bu dost birim bir zenoysa bu vuruş her zaman {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşa{/g} dönüşür.
Dost birim çatışmada kalırsa 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}canın pahasına!{/g} etkisi kazanır.
Aynı dost birim {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}baygın{/g} düşerse bu etki onun yerine Komiser'in diğer tüm dost birimlerine (Komiser'in kendisi hariç) uygulanır ve bu kabiliyetin {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süresi{/g}, Komiser'in bir sonraki turunun başlangıcında sıfırlanır.

languages.text:
The Commissar chooses an ally (not a familiar) in their pistol range and shoots them with their right hand pistol, dealing {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}% damage. This shot ignores armor, deflection, and always hits (can't be dodged). If the ally survives, they get {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}Summary Discipline{/g}.
If the ally is incapacitated, all other allies in the Commissar's retinue (except the Commissar) receive this bonus instead.
This damage is always critical against Xenos allies.
! This ability can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
The Commissar chooses an ally (not a familiar) in their pistol range and shoots them with their right hand pistol, dealing {uip|Pistol|cdbe5dd63fd84f3fb20f37e7ad043f6e}% damage. This shot ignores armor, deflection, and always hits (can't be dodged). If the ally survives, they get {g|f:20a0af90dfed4914a26ffb92b05937e1}Summary Discipline{/g}.
If the ally is incapacitated, all other allies in the Commissar's retinue (except the Commissar) receive this bonus instead.
This damage is always critical against Xenos allies.
! This ability can only be used once per combat.
